H0.text: What Italian author envisioned 9 circles of hell. Giovanni Boccaccio

H1.text: What Italian author envisioned 9 circles of hell. Petrarch

H2.text: What Italian author envisioned 9 circles of hell. Giovanni Verga

H3.text: What Italian author envisioned 9 circles of hell. Dante

A4.text: The Divine Comedy describes Dante's journey through Hell (Inferno), Purgatory (Purgatorio), and Paradise (Paradiso).

A5.text: His depictions of Hell, Purgatory, and Heaven provided inspiration for the larger body of Western art and literature.
